desc: The NDIS approved, top-selling day clock enabling self care and a meaningful life. Peace of mind for people of all ages, their families and carers. Ideal for Alzheimer's Disease, Dementia, Parkinson's Disease, ADHD, Autism Spectrum Disorder, the Vision impaired, people living with a Disability or Acquired Brain Injury.

layout.text:
The Original Award-winning Dawn Clock™
The calendar and reminder clock enabling self care and a meaningful life.
NDIS Approved Provider Australia-wide.
Seniors Card welcome.

Who's life will you change today?
